幧字的基本解释

幧
qiāo
〔幧头〕又作“帩头”，古代男子束发的巾。
方言，帽子。

幧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiāo］
［《廣韻》七遥切，平宵，清。］
［《廣韻》七刀切，平豪，清。］
见“幧頭”。

幧字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【巾字部】　幧； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页337第08
【廣韻】【集韻】七遙切【韻會】【正韻】此遙切，?音鍫。【說文】斂髮也。【廣韻】所以覆髻。【玉篇】幧頭也。【揚子·方言】幧頭，自河以北，趙魏之閒曰幧頭。或謂之?，或謂之㡋，或謂之䰎帶，或謂之䰍帶。【廣雅】絡頭，幧頭也。【古樂府·陌上桑】少年見羅敷，脫帽著幧頭。　又【類篇】或作幓。【儀禮·喪服註】以麻自項中而前交於額上，却繞紒如著幓頭焉。　又通作綃。【釋名】綃頭，綃，鈔也，鈔髮使上從也。或曰帞頭。齊人謂之㡋。【後漢·向詡傳】好被髮，著絳綃頭。【註】綃，當作幧。　又通作帩。【晉書·五行志】太元中人，不復著帩頭。又【廣韻】七刀切【集韻】倉刀切，?音操。義同。　【類篇】或作㡑。

幧字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
幧字的起名意思

暂无。

幧
Basic explanation of words
幧
qiāo
[Xiaotou] is also called "帩头", a scarf used by ancient men to tie their hair.
Dialects, hats.
幧
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiāo］
["Guangyun" seven distant cuts, evening, and Qing. ]
["Guangyun" seven-size-fits-all, Pinghao, Qing. ]
See "幧头".
幧
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Scarf Character Department] 　幧; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 337 08
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] Seven Remote Cuts [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] This remote cut,? Yin 鍫. [Said the text] Lianfa also. [Guang Yun] So the updo is covered. [Jade articles] Sitou also. [Yangtze Dialect] Sitou, from the north of the river, Zhao Weizhi said Sitou freely. Either it is?, or it is 㡋, or it is 導zone, or it is 對zone. [Guang Ya] Luotou, Xitou also. [Gu Yuefu·Mo Shangsang] Seeing Luo Fu, the young man took off his head and took off his head.　[Classes] or composing. 【Ritual·Mourning Apparel Note】Use hemp to hand it on the forehead in the middle of the item, but it goes around like a scorpion.　It's all over again. 【Release name】Rangtou, silk, money, and money-issuing ambassador. Or called Biantou. Qi people call it 㡋. [Later Han·Xiang Xu Chuan] It was so sent, with a crimson head. [Note] 绡, regarded as 幧.　Recommendation. 【Book of Jin·Five Elements】The scholars of Taiyuan no longer have their heads. Also [Guangyun] Seven knife cuts [Jiyun] Cang knife cuts, sound operation. The same meaning.　【Classes】Or make 㡑.
